      • getNextSaturdayEpochTime

        public static long getNextSaturdayEpochTime(int hourOfDay)
        Provides the time in milliseconds from the epoch to the next Saturday. Time will be set according to hourOfDay param. If current date is Saturday and current time is bigger then time represented byt hourOfDay param, time for next Saturday wil be returned. ex: if current date corresponds to Tue Feb 14 14:00:00 PST 2017 and hourOfDay is 20, the output milliseconds would correspond to Sut Feb 18 20:00:00 PST 2017
        Parameters:
        hourOfDay - Hour of day that will be set for Saturday. Has to correspond to Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY.
